(acoustic audiophile recording @ vintage instruments)

Close miking:
- Same microphones and set-up for each cut
Recorded:
- Direct to 2-track analog, without any tonal enhancement
No equalization
No compression

Artist placement:
(L) - left channel, (R) - right channel
